name: Knock Harder
detailed_description:
I've always wondered how Dominic Cobb felt at Nolan's "Inception." Or the Doctor (from Doctor Who) when he was under the influence of Dream Crabs. Or Rick and Morty in the chamber simulating the reality of aliens. That's why I made this game, which is a gamification of these situations. In it, the player needs to understand by the small details of whether he woke up or be somewhere else in a multilevel dream. And, depending on that, die to Wake up, or survive.

Feature of game:

-Unique gameplay, where the player himself, without prompting makes a decision that can be fatal.

-More than 100 variants of ordinary and secret dreams.

-Unusual combination of two graphic styles.

short_description: Knock Harder is a multilevel sleep gamification. The only way to Wake up is to die. The player must understand himself: he is in a dream or in reality.
